name: XWUI Speed Dial Component
description: Floating action button component with expandable menu of actions. Supports various directions for action expansion, custom positioning, and icon customization. Useful for quick access to multiple actions.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

open.description: Whether the speed dial is initially open

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string for the main button

position.description: Position of the speed dial on screen

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the speed dial

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string for the action

onClick.description: Click handler function (not serializable in JSON)
